servicetitan.positioning: Enterprise field-service platform; powerful but heavy and best for larger teams.
servicetitan.pocketcfoAngle: Keep ServiceTitan for operations; use PocketCFO to make sense of profits, cash flow, and pricing.

jobber.positioning: Simple, clean scheduling and invoicing for small/mid-sized contractors.
jobber.pocketcfoAngle: Jobber organises your day; PocketCFO shows whether the jobs you scheduled are actually profitable.

housecall_pro.positioning: Scheduling and routing for door-to-door service work, with customer notifications.
housecall_pro.pocketcfoAngle: Housecall Pro helps you get to the job; PocketCFO helps you get paid properly and keep more of it.
